InstructionData.Title: Atmospherics Monitor
InstructionData.Author: onebit
InstructionData.Instructions:
# Atmospherics Monitor # https://github.com/dtandersen/stationeers-library alias GasSensor d0 alias O2Pressure d1 alias CO2Pressure d2 alias N2Pressure d3 alias H2Pressure d4 alias XPressure d5
alias device r0 alias pressure r1 # overall pressure alias ratio r2 # ratio of gas alias partial r3 # partial pressure of gas alias o2pp r4 alias n2pp r5 alias co2pp r6 alias h2pp r7 alias xpp r8 alias no2pp r9 alias color r10 alias temp1 r11 alias toxin r12
define DISPHASH HASH("StructureConsoleLED5") define O2HASH HASH("O2 Pressure") define N2HASH HASH("N2 Pressure") define CO2HASH HASH("CO2 Pressure") define H2HASH HASH("H2 Pressure") define XHASH HASH("X Pressure") define NO2HASH HASH("NO2 Pressure")
define OK 2 define ERROR 4 define WARN 5 define O2ERROR 20 define O2WARN 25 define TOXINMAX 0.5 define TOXINWARN 0.1 define H2MAX 0.01 define H2WARN 0 define NO2MAX 5 define NO2WARN 1
init: move device 1 initloop: bgt device 5 start bdns dr0 nodevice s dr0 On 1 s dr0 Mode 0 s dr0 Color OK nodevice: add device device 1 j initloop
start: l pressure GasSensor Pressure l ratio GasSensor RatioOxygen mul o2pp ratio pressure l ratio GasSensor RatioCarbonDioxide mul co2pp ratio pressure l ratio GasSensor RatioNitrogen mul n2pp ratio pressure l ratio GasSensor RatioVolatiles mul h2pp ratio pressure l ratio GasSensor RatioPollutant mul xpp ratio pressure l ratio GasSensor RatioNitrousOxide mul no2pp ratio pressure add toxin xpp h2pp
o2: slt temp1 o2pp O2WARN select color temp1 WARN OK slt temp1 o2pp O2ERROR select color temp1 ERROR color sbn DISPHASH O2HASH Setting o2pp sbn DISPHASH O2HASH Color color
co2: sbn DISPHASH CO2HASH Setting co2pp
n2: sbn DISPHASH N2HASH Setting n2pp
h2: sgt temp1 h2pp H2WARN select color temp1 WARN OK sgt temp1 h2pp H2MAX select color temp1 ERROR color sbn DISPHASH H2HASH Setting h2pp sbn DISPHASH H2HASH Color color
x: sgt temp1 toxin TOXINWARN select color temp1 WARN OK sgt temp1 toxin TOXINMAX select color temp1 ERROR color sbn DISPHASH XHASH Setting xpp sbn DISPHASH XHASH Color color
no2: sgt temp1 no2pp NO2WARN select color temp1 WARN OK sgt temp1 no2pp NO2MAX select color temp1 ERROR color sbn DISPHASH NO2HASH Setting no2pp sbn DISPHASH NO2HASH Color color
done: yield j start
